name: Space Blaster!
description:
This is the finished version of my 2D Shooter "Space Blaster!"

Modifications from tutorial version

- Updated menu screen with functional instructions screen

-Different backgrounds for each level with different scenery

-Rebalanced enemies (health, move speed, etc.)

-3 Unique levels with varied enemy encounters

-Updated UI with player lives counter and enemies remaining counter

-Animated title text for each level

Credits:

Made by Elia Spyratos
